DOC.brief_summary: To examine retrospectively whether transcatheter closure of the interatrial septum leads to myocardial injury and to determine the mechanism.
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Troponin T After Transcatheter Closure of the Interatrial Septum
DOC.detailed_description: In a prospective study in adults troponin T (TnT) serum concentrations were determined before and the day after transcatheter closure of an atrial septal defect (ASD) or patent foramen ovale (PFO).
DOC.criteria: transcatheter ASD and PFO closure at the University Hospital of Lund, Sweden missing TnT values
